Text:
If this the DeathSpank that I saw in some videos from PAX, this must be an awesome game.

I would recommend to search youtube for some gameplay videos.
Forgot to say: Thank you for the upload and thanks to THETA for the cracked game.
Above all the spanish, it says English.  Why the uploader is giving a description in spanish for an english torrent is anyone's guess.
If you try to uninstall this game and you have a anti-virus software it will detect a backdoor virus. No virus  my ass. If you don't believe me than try it but I advise you not to download this file.

@Tippee

wich anti virus software r u using?

This is a false positive, obviously.

Try the SKIDROW release, but I doubt that you will not get virus alert, now or in future definition updates.

Cracks are reported as viruses or trojans by Anti-viruses.  This is (obviously) also an anti-piracy measure.  So live with it or better buy the game.
